attributes.action: Stop the political correct nonsense now
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Political correctness in our nation has gone mad, and now the majority of British people are afraid to speak their mind. Our freedom of spech has been incroached upon by successive Goverments and now we are at the point where everyone is afraid to say anything, in fear it may offend someone, somewhere. This is political correctness gone mad. We want the polictical correctness to stop

reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
